Package org.restlet.ext.jaas

Support for JAAS authentication and authorization framework.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ChallengeCallbackHandler JAAS callback handler that automatically provides the identifier and secret when asked by login modules.
JaasUtils Utility class to facilitate integration between the Restlet and JAAS APIs.
JaasVerifier Verifier that leverages the JAAS pluggable authentication mechanism.
 

Package org.restlet.ext.jaas Description

Support for JAAS authentication and authorization framework.

Since:
Restlet 2.0
